title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream #24
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Can't believe I missed the stream 😭😭😭

And Yaaasssss. Born This Way by Lady G. Love it. ❤ Speaking of her, unfortunately she won't be in season 7 because she's on tour but she did say she would love to return to future seasons and also other Ryan Murphy projects. If she we're to do another RM show I could see her on American Crime Story. Idk if I'm the only one that was hoping she would do at least one episode of Scream Queens before it got cancelled.
I would like if the theme got announced on July 4th.
Mary make sure you see my messages to you!!!
description:
Welcome to American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Streams! Host is MaryGirl Moody.
